summary.para: Contains options that affect text processing.
Initializes a new instance of the OptionsSpelling class.
Represents the base component of the DXSpellChecker Suite for WPF.
Initializes a new instance of the SpellChecker class.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.CanCheck(System.Windows.Controls.Control)

summary.para: Checks whether the control is registered for use with the DXSpellChecker.

member.param: A descendant, representing a control to be checked for spelling mistakes.
member.returns: true if the control is already registered by the DXSpellChecker; otherwise false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.Check(System.Windows.Controls.Control)

summary.para: Checks the specified control for spelling mistakes.

member.param: A object representing a control to be checked for spelling mistakes.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.Check(DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.Native.ISpellCheckTextControlController)

summary.para: Checks the spelling of the text available through the controller interface.

member.param: An object implementing the ISpellCheckTextController interface.

summary.para: Occurs when the spell check is complete.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.CheckContainer(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)

summary.para: Checks the controls within the container for spelling mistakes.

member.param: A object, representing a container which holds controls to be checked for spelling mistakes.

summary.para: Checks the spelling of the controls in the container specified for the DXSpellCkecker instance.
Occurs when the culture setting of the spell cheker is changed.
This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.GetCommandsByError(DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.Rules.SpellCheckErrorBase)

summary.para: Creates a list of commands available to an end-user, which depend on the type of misspelling and current spell checker operation mode.

member.param: A object, representing a situation when a misspelled word is found.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.IsChecking

summary.para: Indicates whether the current DXSpellChecker control performs a spelling check.

member.value: true if a spelling check is performed; otherwise, false.

summary.para: [To be supplied]
Occurs when the Spelling Options form used to specify the is about to be shown.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.OptionsSpelling

summary.para: Provides access to the spelling options set for the spell checker instance.

member.value: An object containing the spell checking options.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.SpellChecker.SpellChecker.ParentContainer

summary.para: Gets or sets the control, representing the parent container for the DXSpellChecker instance.

member.value: A object, which is the parent container for the controls to be checked.

summary.para: Gets or sets the DXSpellChecker operation mode.
Occurs when the property is changed.
Occurs when the Spelling form is about to be displayed or an end-user clicks the command button that changes the form's contents.
